mapper.select: SELECT TAKE_ID , USER_ID , SCHE_TITLE , TIME_ID , TIME_NAME , TAKE_DATE , TAKE_SUCCESS FROM TAKE_LOG TL NATURAL JOIN SCHE_TIME NATURAL JOIN SCHEDULE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY TAKE_DATE

SELECT TAKE_ID , USER_ID , SCHE_TITLE , TIME_ID , TIME_NAME , TAKE_DATE , TAKE_SUCCESS FROM TAKE_LOG TL NATURAL JOIN SCHE_TIME NATURAL JOIN SCHEDULE WHERE DATE(TAKE_DATE) = DATE(#{takeDate}) AND USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY TAKE_DATE
SELECT SCHE_ID , TIME_ID , SCHE_TITLE , TIME_NAME , TIME_ALARM FROM SCHE_TIME NATURAL JOIN SCHEDULE WHERE SCHE_END_DATE >= DATE(NOW()) AND SCHE_START_DATE <= DATE(NOW()) AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT SCHE_ID , TIME_ID , SCHE_TITLE , TIME_NAME , TIME_ALARM FROM SCHE_TIME NATURAL JOIN SCHEDULE WHERE SCHE_END_DATE >= DATE(#{takeDate}) AND SCHE_START_DATE <= DATE(#{takeDate}) AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT DATE(DATE_SUB(#{takeDate}, INTERVAL SEQ DAY)) AS TAKEDATE, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHE_TIME NATURAL JOIN SCHEDULE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND SCHE_START_DATE <= DATE(DATE_SUB(#{takeDate}, INTERVAL SEQ DAY)) AND SCHE_END_DATE >= DATE(DATE_SUB(#{takeDate}, INTERVAL SEQ DAY)) ) AS CNTALARM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TAKE_LOG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DATE(TAKE_DATE) = DATE(DATE_SUB(#{takeDate}, INTERVAL SEQ DAY)) ) AS CNTTAKELOG FROM ( SELECT 0 AS SEQ UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 ) AS TAKEDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAKE_LOG ( TAKE_ID , USER_ID , TIME_ID , TAKE_DATE , TAKE_SUCCESS ) VALUES ( CONCAT('LOG_', LPAD(NEXT VALUE FOR SQ_TIME, 6, '0')) , #{userId} , #{timeId} , NOW() , 'N' )
